description:
Volume backed snapshots are NOT being set private ('is_public": False) by default.  

Something similar to 
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/e163d8293e82fd585d3579847d4e5368f401dce2/nova/compute/api.py#L1894

is needed around
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/e163d8293e82fd585d3579847d4e5368f401dce2/nova/compute/api.py#L1914

Documentation: http://docs.openstack.org/grizzly/openstack-compute/admin/content//cloudpipe-upload-image.html
title: volume backed snapshots are NOT private by default

comments.content:
@Matt Fischer

This bug is only reproducible when snapshotting a volume backed Instance.
If you use standard image based instances then you wont see the bug.

Were the ones you tested volume based? (boot from volume)?
